text: BRITAIN - One cannot but wonder at British bases being put at the disposal of those very militarists who razed Coventry and barbarously bombed London and other British cities. FRANCE - One can hardly conceive the French are not alarmed.... Next door, in West Germany, before everyone's eyes there has sprung up a regular army led by former Nazi generals and officers.
handwritten_text: BRITAIN - One cannot but wonder at British bases being put at the disposal of those very militarists who razed Coventry and barbarously bombed London and other British cities. FRANCE - One can hardly conceive the French are not alarmed.... Next door, in West Germany, before everyone's eyes there has sprung up a regular army led by former Nazi generals and officers.
